info.name: users
info.description: A collection of requests for `/users` endpoint.

request.description:
# Get all users #

## Response ##
------------
List of booking details where each list item contains:
 - `user_id`
 - `full_name`
 - `email`
 - `address`
 - `contact`
 - `role`

response.name: Mock Get All Users

request.description:
# Get a user by id#

## Response ##
------------
 - `user_id`
 - `full_name`
 - `email`
 - `address`
 - `contact`
 - `role`
# Update user details # ## Response ## ------------ - None ***Note*** : `message` header indicates result.
